statements: SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics;
SELECT id, date, latency_ms FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms > 100;
SELECT network_name, bandwidth_mbps FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, network_name, latency_ms, bandwidth_mbps FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE network_name = 'Network A';
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE bandwidth_mbps <= 50 AND latency_ms >= 50;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, network_name, latency_ms FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE bandwidth_mbps < 100 AND latency_ms < 50 ORDER BY latency_ms ASC;
SELECT network_name, AVG(latency_ms) AS avg_latency FROM network_performance_metrics GROUP BY network_name HAVING AVG(latency_ms) > 50 ORDER BY avg_latency DESC;
SELECT date, SUM(latency_ms) AS total_latency FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT network_name, MAX(bandwidth_mbps) AS max_bandwidth FROM network_performance_metrics GROUP BY network_name ORDER BY max_bandwidth DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, server_name FROM capacity_planning ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM capacity_planning WHERE capacity_used < capacity_threshold;
SELECT metric_name, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM network_performance_metrics GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT id, timestamp, metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Throughput'
SELECT id, timestamp, metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, timestamp, metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, server_name, capacity_used, capacity_threshold FROM capacity_planning WHERE server_name = 'Server-A'
SELECT id, timestamp, server_name, capacity_used, capacity_threshold FROM capacity_planning WHERE capacity_used > 80
SELECT * FROM network_performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM site_metrics WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT planning_id, site_id, expected_bandwidth FROM capacity_planning WHERE projected_latency > 50;
SELECT site_id, last_update FROM site_metrics ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(latency) AS max_latency, MIN(latency) AS min_latency FROM network_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT site_name, location FROM site_metrics WHERE location='New York'
SELECT site_name, COUNT(*) FROM site_metrics GROUP BY site_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT planning_id, expected_bandwidth, projected_latency FROM capacity_planning WHERE site_id=1
SELECT * FROM network_performance_data WHERE latency > 50 AND bandwidth < 100
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT timestamp, metric_name FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT traffic_id, timestamp, source_device_id, destination_device_id FROM network_traffic ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT server_id, timestamp, capacity_value FROM network_capacity ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM network_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT server_name, latency_ms, throughput_mbps FROM network_metrics WHERE server_name = 'Server A';
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM network_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM network_errors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_type, analyst, findings FROM network_reports WHERE report_type = 'Daily' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_metrics;
SELECT server_name, latency_ms FROM network_metrics WHERE latency_ms > 50 ORDER BY latency_ms DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM network_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT timestamp, error_code, error_description FROM network_errors ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_type, analyst, findings FROM network_reports WHERE report_type = 'Performance' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
